body_html:
I also tried with cuda9.2 cudnn 7.1.4, got the same errors .
anyone can help me. @pjh5

 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/threadpool/pthreadpool.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/threadpool/ThreadPool.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/proto_utils.cc.o
In file included from /home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/ThreadPool.cc:2:0:
/home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/WorkersPool.h: In static member function ‘static T* caffe2::AllocAligned<T>::alloc(Args&& ...) [with Args = {caffe2::BlockingCounter*}; T = caffe2::Worker]’:
/home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/WorkersPool.h:41:5: warning: ignoring return value of ‘int posix_memalign(void**, size_t, size_t)’, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Wunused-result]
     posix_memalign((void**)&p, kGEMMLOWPCacheLineSize, sizeof(T));
     ^
At global scope:
cc1plus: warning: unrecognized command line option ‘-Wno-invalid-partial-specialization’
[ 63%] Linking CXX shared library ../lib/libcaffe2.so
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lcudart
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lnvrtc
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/build.make:8032: recipe for target 'lib/libcaffe2.so' failed

CMakeFiles/Makefile2:3552: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
Linking   libnccl.so.1.3.5                    > /home/cgilab/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/lib/libnccl.so.1.3.5
Archiving libnccl_static.a                    > /home/cgilab/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/lib/libnccl_static.a
[ 63%] No install step for 'nccl_external'

[ 63%] Built target nccl_external
Makefile:138: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2

body:
I also tried with cuda9.2 cudnn 7.1.4, got the same errors .
anyone can help me. @pjh5 

```
 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/threadpool/pthreadpool.cc.o
[ 63%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/utils/threadpool/ThreadPool.cc.o

In file included from /home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/ThreadPool.cc:2:0:
/home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/WorkersPool.h: In static member function ‘static T* caffe2::AllocAligned<T>::alloc(Args&& ...) [with Args = {caffe2::BlockingCounter*}; T = caffe2::Worker]’:
/home/cgilab/pytorch/caffe2/utils/threadpool/WorkersPool.h:41:5: warning: ignoring return value of ‘int posix_memalign(void**, size_t, size_t)’, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Wunused-result]
     posix_memalign((void**)&p, kGEMMLOWPCacheLineSize, sizeof(T));
     ^
At global scope:
cc1plus: warning: unrecognized command line option ‘-Wno-invalid-partial-specialization’
[ 63%] Linking CXX shared library ../lib/libcaffe2.so
```
